ComicInfo.Summary:
As Anthony settles in at the Bodega Bay Inn the Followers of Anapa come calling, bringing the Michela Da Saccoone step closer to being freed from their deal with the demon god Anapa. But every deal with the devil comes with a hidden price...
Variant and variant sketch covers limited to 2,000 copies each.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Michela Da Sacco (p, i) & Yann Perrelet (c) | 1 | | Var | Limited Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Andrew Mangum (p, i) & Gene Jimenez (c) | 2 | | Var | Limited Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Andrew Mangum (p, i) | 3 |
ComicInfo.Title: Blood Debt (1 of 4)
